definition: to separate mentally (or distinguish), i.e.(generally) understand
kjvTranslation: attend, consider, be cunning, diligently, direct, discern, eloquent, feel, inform, instruct, have intelligence, know, look well to, mark, perceive, be prudent, regard, (can) skill(-full), teach, think, (cause, make to, get, give, have) understand(-ing), view, (deal) wise(-ly, man).

translations.bg: да отделяме мислено (или да разграничаваме), т.е. (по принцип) да разбираме
translations.da: at adskille mentalt (eller skelne), dvs. (generelt) forstå
translations.el: να διαχωρίζω διανοητικά (ή να διακρίνω), δηλαδή (γενικά) να καταλαβαίνω
translations.es: separar mentalmente (o distinguir), es decir (en general) comprender
translations.id: memisahkan secara mental (atau membedakan), yaitu (secara umum) memahami
translations.it: separare mentalmente (o distinguere), cioè (in generale) comprendere
translations.ja: 精神的に分ける（区別する）、つまり（一般的に）理解する
translations.lt: protu atskirti (arba atskirti), t. y. (paprastai) suprasti
translations.nb: å skille mentalt (eller skille mellom), dvs. (generelt) forstå
translations.nl: mentaal scheiden (of onderscheiden), d.w.z. (in het algemeen) begrijpen
translations.pt: separar mentalmente (ou distinguir), ou seja, (geralmente) compreender
translations.ro: a separa mental (sau a distinge), adică (în general) a înțelege
translations.ru: мысленно разделять (или различать), т.е. (в целом) понимать
translations.sk: mentálne oddeliť (alebo rozlíšiť), t. j. (všeobecne) pochopiť
translations.sl: miselno ločiti (ali razlikovati), tj. (na splošno) razumeti
translations.sv: att mentalt skilja (eller urskilja), dvs.(allmänt) förstå
translations.tr: zihinsel olarak ayırmak (veya ayırt etmek), yani (genellikle) anlamak
translations.zh: 在心理上分离（或区分），即（一般）理解
